item.title: Chitãozinho & Xororó - Pura Emoção
item.description:
Achy Breaky Heart by Billy Ray Cyrus. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: F & C (or F & C7)
SAME SONG IN C (using C and G or G7): https://youtu.be/Mvx_NsalPkY
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Joe Brown - Joe Brown - I'll See You In My Dreams - Jools Holland - 2008_UGC
item.description:
**NOT FOR BEGINNERS**
I'll See You In My Dreams by Joe Brown And The Bruvvers. For educational use. Chords Used: A7, Am, Bb, Bb6, Bb6-2, Bbm6, Bbmaj7, C, C7, Cm6, Cmaj7, D, D7, D7-2, D7(HI), D9, Dm, E7, E7-2, Edim, Em7, F, F/C, F6, F6-5, F7, Fmaj7, G7 (yes, this song uses 28 chords). The video is from YouTuber Elisa M. and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWERLNXIZGc. The chord progressions I used were heavily inspired by Jim’s Ukulele Songbook, which may be found at https://ozbcoz.com/Songs/downloadpdf.php?ID=3748%2Csongbook&fbclid=IwAR2UAs9814iikntmCk_pnDdsa9bE964sFKWluY5DTEEr4dIH5qDr2sdSB50 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: McFly - All About You
item.description:
All About You by McFly. It’s been digitally lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C Am F G E7 C7 D7 Fm G+
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Christopher Davis-Shannon - Don't Call Me Honey
item.description:
For educational use. For GCEA Ukulele. Key of Eb, but written in C with the intent of the player using a capo on the 3rd Fret. At the original key.
Chords Shown: C, C7, F, Fm6, G7, A7, D7, F#dim7, B7, E7, Fm
As performed by Christopher Davis-Shannon. Special thanks to him, as he gave me permission to use this song and also provided help with the chords shown. Incidentally, he plays the song "in C" but on a ukulele tuned up a minor third (i.e. Eb).
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE):
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Various Artists - The Window Cleaner
item.description:
Ukulele play along
When I'm Cleaning Windows (In C) - George Formby
Using the chords: A7 C C7 Cdim7 D7 E7 F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU
Notes: This is a higher key than our other version.
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Eric Clapton - Tears in Heaven
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: F, C, Dm Bb, A, Gm, Cm, D, C7
Tears in Heaven by Eric Clapton. This version does not have the bridge. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones to the key of C so beginner ukulele students can play along. Some of the more complex chords have been simplified or skipped.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: The Dell Vikings - Come Go With Me
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
Chords Used: G, Em, Am, D7, C7, G7
As performed by the Del-Vikings
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/rprSsbEBBzI
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Dawn - Tie a Yellow Ribbon Round the Ole Oak Tree
item.description: Performed by Tony Orlando & Dawn Written by Irwin Levine & L. Russel Brown

item.title: Jimmy Buffett - Hey Good Lookin'
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Hey Good Lookin’ on the ukulele by Jimmy Buffett, Clint Black, Alan Jackson, Toby Keith, George Strait, and Kenny Chesney. The chords used are C F G D7 C7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Roy Orbison - Dream Baby
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Dream Baby on the ukulele by Roy Orbison. The chords used are F C7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
